fd_FRIENDS_07x04: In this episode of Friends, the gang watches Mac and C.H.E.E.S.E., a TV show about cheerleaders and explosives. They all have different opinions on the show and decide to keep it a secret from their parents. Rachel gets a new job as the merchandising manager for Polo, and she interviews a potential assistant, Hilda. Chandler hires an assistant, but Rachel decides to hire someone else. Joey gets a job on the TV show Days of Our Lives, playing Stryker Ramoray's twin brother.
fd_Buffy_the_Vampire_Slayer_04x14: In this episode of Buffy the Vampire Slayer, Buffy and her friends are trying to figure out what happened to Riley, who was sent on a mission and then suddenly appeared in front of them. They suspect that something is wrong at the Initiative, the organization that Riley works for, and that Maggie Walsh, the head of the Initiative, might be behind Riley's disappearance. Buffy and her friends decide to relocate to a safer place to come up with a plan to deal with the situation. Meanwhile, Adam, a demon who was sewn together from different parts, is shown interacting with a young boy. The episode ends with Giles waking up in a strange room.
fd_The_Office_05x24: In this episode of The Office, Michael and Dwight have a tense conversation about the future of their respective companies, Dunder Mifflin and Ed's Tires. Meanwhile, Pam and Jim discuss their relationship and whether or not they should get a crucifix cake for their upcoming wedding. The episode ends with Michael getting hit in the face with a pee-filled water balloon.
fd_Angel_03x07: In this episode of Buffy the Vampire Slayer, Angel is visited by Holtz, a vampire hunter who wants to kill Angel for his past crimes. However, Angel is able to convince Holtz to spare his life and instead help him find a way to rid himself of his demonic curse. Meanwhile, Darla and other vampires attack the monsignor who excommunicated Holtz, and Cordelia and Angel practice fighting in case the apocalypse is coming.
fd_The_Office_03x20: In the episode, Andy Bernard returns to the office after a five-week anger management program and has a new attitude and name, Drew. However, the office is still wary of him and he faces shunning from Dwight and Jim. The episode also features a safety training session led by Toby, which is met with boredom by the office workers, and a bet between Jim and Kevin over the number of jellybeans in a jar.
fd_Doctor_Who_1963_14x21: In this episode of the TV series "Doctor Who," the Doctor and Leela arrive in Victorian London and attend a magic show at the Theatre Royal. The show is being performed by Li H'sen Chang, a Chinese magician who is using his powers to levitate a woman on stage. However, when the Doctor and Leela witness the show, they notice that something is amiss and that the woman is not actually levitating. They soon discover that Li H'sen Chang is using a device to control the woman's mind and that she has been kidnapped by a group of people who are using her to perform a ritual. The Doctor and Leela team up with Li H'sen Chang to rescue the woman and stop the ritual from taking place. Along the way, they encounter various obstacles and challenges, including a group of thieves who are trying to steal a valuable artifact from the theatre. The episode ends with the Doctor and Leela successfully rescuing the woman and foiling the ritual, but not before the Doctor is arrested by the police for interfering in their investigation.
fd_Frasier_07x04: In the first act of the episode, Frasier is signing off his radio show when Roz mentions that Chester Ludgate, an old man who has been a part of the radio station for a long time, is retiring. Frasier is surprised to hear this and learns that Roz has been asked to help with the final broadcast. Meanwhile, Poppy Delafield, the daughter of the station owner, comes to the radio station to learn about the radio industry. Poppy is very enthusiastic and excited to be there, but she is also very naive and doesn't know much about the industry. She talks a lot and Frasier finds her annoying. In the second act, Frasier and Roz are having a coffee when Poppy comes to them and starts telling them her life story. Frasier is not interested and tries to get rid of her, but she refuses to leave. Later, Niles enters the scene and takes Roz's seat, and he and Frasier talk about Niles' new job as a music critic for a magazine.
fd_Frasier_10x16: In this episode of Frasier, Frasier is reluctant to participate in the KACL AIDS Bike-A-Thon, but is eventually convinced to go by Kenny, Julia, and Roz. However, he is not interested in actually riding a bike and plans to just sit in the back and watch. Niles, on the other hand, is excited to participate and wants to learn how to ride a bike. Frasier and Niles go to a sporting goods store to buy bikes, but they are not very successful at it and end up covered in scratches and bruises. Frasier suggests they go to the library to learn how to ride, but Niles is already committed to riding with Daphne the next day.
fd_Justified_06x12: In this episode of Justified, Raylan Givens is determined to find Boyd Crowder, who has stolen a police vehicle and is possibly wearing a police uniform. Raylan speaks with various individuals, including a man who had a run-in with Boyd in the past and a woman who reports a possible sighting of Boyd. Meanwhile, Boyd and his companions are on the run, trying to evade capture and find a way to escape. They encounter a man who may be able to help them, but their plans are complicated by the arrival of a group of federal agents.
fd_Charmed_06x13: In this episode of "Charmed," the four main characters, Phoebe, Paige, Jason, and Richard, gather at the manor for a dinner party. However, tensions rise when Phoebe avoids telling Jason about her witchcraft, leading to a series of misunderstandings and conflicts. Meanwhile, Piper and Leo discuss the importance of nurturing peace and serenity in their lives, while Paige and Richard debate the concept of karma and the possibility of starting over. The episode ends with a group of demons attacking the manor, forcing the characters to band together to defend themselves and their home.
fd_Pretty_Little_Liars_01x03: In the previous episode, the girls found out that Alison is dead and they went to the police station to give a statement. However, Detective Wilden made them feel uncomfortable and suspicious. The girls decided to have a shrine for Alison in the woods, but Hanna was not comfortable with the idea. They also found out that Alison's fiancé, Wren, was in town and they were all invited to the wedding. Spencer's mother, Veronica, was not happy about the situation and tried to talk to Melissa about it. Meanwhile, Sean and Noel were planning a big party while Mona was worried about not having a date for it.
fd_Buffy_the_Vampire_Slayer_06x14: In this episode of Buffy the Vampire Slayer, Dawn is stealing money from the magic shop to buy jewelry. Buffy is called away on a mission, and Dawn decides to have a party while she's gone. However, the party is crashed by a demon who challenges Buffy to a fight. Buffy defeats the demon, but is left feeling guilty about using her powers to kill him. Meanwhile, Willow and Tara are trying to come up with a new name for their spellcasting group, and Anya is excited about the prospect of setting up a birthday party for Buffy.
fd_Justified_04x01: In this episode of "Justified," Raylan investigates a double homicide case in Knoxville, Tennessee, and teams up with a bail bondswoman named Sharon Evans to track down the suspect, Jody Adair. Meanwhile, Boyd and his crew face financial troubles due to a decline in OxyContin sales, and Boyd begins to question his faith after a near-death experience. The episode also features a confrontation between Raylan and a group of burglars who have broken into his friend's house.
fd_Doctor_Who_01x02: In this episode of Doctor Who, the Doctor and Rose travel to the future to witness the end of the world. They arrive on a space station where a group of wealthy people have gathered to watch the Earth burn. The Doctor and Rose discover that the Earth has been preserved by the National Trust, and that the people on the space station are there to witness the end of humanity. They also meet a group of aliens who have come to the station to exchange gifts and celebrate the end of the world. The Doctor and Rose participate in the festivities, but Rose is left feeling lost and alone when she realizes that there are no other humans on the space station.
fd_The_Office_08x23: In this episode of The Office, the employees compete in a flat curl contest to determine who is the strongest, while Dwight and Gabe argue about protein powder and estrogen. Jim and Andy discuss the possibility of starting a branch in Syracuse, and Harry Jannerone visits the office to discuss the closure of the Binghamton branch. Robert California makes a bizarre decision about the Prestige direct mail solutions client, and the employees debate whether he is a good leader.
fd_Justified_06x11: In this episode of the TV show, Raylan Givens and Boyd Crowder are involved in a cat-and-mouse game, with Boyd trying to evade capture and Raylan determined to bring him in. Ava, Boyd's ex-girlfriend and a CIA informant, is also involved in the episode, as she helps Boyd and becomes a key player in the plot. The episode ends with a cliffhanger, as Boyd is shot and left for dead, and Raylan and Ava are left to wonder whether Boyd is truly dead or if he will somehow manage to survive.
fd_CSI__Crime_Scene_Investigation_06x02: In the episode, a young Vietnamese man is seen leaving a casino with two women. He gets into a taxi, but the fare is never paid and the taxi driver is later found dead with the money still in the visor. The investigation leads the detectives to a motel where they find the victim's ID and a connection to a previous murder. The detectives also discover that the victim was involved in a robbery and that the taxi driver was not the intended target. The episode ends with the discovery of a new victim and a flashback to the previous murder.
fd_Alias_01x04: In this episode, Sydney and Ana are tasked with decoding a piece of paper with binary digits written on it. They memorize the sequence and then give it to Dixon, who gives it to SD-6. However, Sydney and Ana have given SD-6 the wrong sequence, and Vaughn is concerned about the consequences if they are caught. Meanwhile, Sloane and Russett are working on a project related to Rambaldi, a mysterious figure from the past who left behind a series of clues. Sydney and Francie follow Charlie, who is acting suspiciously, and Will helps them investigate. The episode ends with Sydney and Francie discovering that Charlie is having an affair.
fd_The_Vampire_Diaries_01x11: In this episode of The Vampire Diaries, Elena has an accident and collides with a man. She is confused and disoriented, but Damon helps her and takes her to Georgia. Alaric is searching for a way to defeat the evil in Mystic Falls, and Stefan tries to contact Elena through her necklace. Bonnie is having trouble with her powers and seeks help from Grams. Meanwhile, Jeremy is researching in the library when Anna helps him with his studies.
fd_The_O.C._03x01: In this episode of The O.C., Ryan and Trey get into a fight, and Trey gets shot. Marissa and Ryan are worried about Trey's condition, and they visit him in the hospital. Meanwhile, Seth and Summer are trying to enjoy their summer, but the events of the previous season continue to affect them. Sandy is dealing with the aftermath of Kirsten's departure, and the DA is pressuring Ryan to testify against Trey. The episode ends with Ryan having a nightmare about Trey.
